data.title: Our Mail Bag News - 323rd Bomb Group 454th Bomb Squadron
data.meta_description: Our Mail Bag News - 323rd Bomb Group 454th Bomb Squadron
data.text: GREETINGS TO EVERYONE Page 1 of 18 April 2011 Wow, here we are preparing for our upcoming reunion already; this will be our 36 th Annual Reunion which will be held in the twin city area of Minneapolis, Minnesota. We have received some great news - 455 th BS and the 344 th BG will be joining us this year. We are looking forward to seeing everyone once again as we have created some special friendships. Once again, our Directory already has some changes and additions, thank you to everyone with your input; with your assistance we can keep our directory current. We will continue to pass them along in our newsletters any and all up-dates for our directory. So, if you know of anything in our current directory that is incorrect please contact me preferably by email at kville93@cox.net or you can call me at 480-984-3676 and leave a voice message and I can return your call as soon as possible. Your email addresses are very important to us because it will enable us to provide you with instant information and reduce our operating costs too. All changes provided will be listed in our next Newsletter. Members, who do not have a 2010 directory and would like to have one please contact me at the email or phone number listed above. Our Mail Bag News Tom & Beth Blas√© Tom underwent open heart surgery in August 2010 and retired from the Air Force on December 1, 2010. He is going to be participating in the AF
